translations: n．小牛肉：指未满一年的小牛的肉，质地柔嫩，味道鲜美。
· I bought some veals for dinner.
我买了一些小牛肉做晚餐。

sentences.sentence: Please let us have two veals.
By relating the output of the eye-movement with the hand control, this paper re-veals the real scenario of the human control behavior model.
sentences.translation: 文中通过把眼动输出和手动输出相联系，进一步揭示了人控制行为模型的真实情况。
